_comment_id: Unique identifier used by the game to reference the fluid tower configuration.
label: Bet Spire
_comment_label: Player-facing name shown in menus for this tower.
_comment_dropSizes: Weighted list of droplet magnitudes; repeated values make smaller drops spawn more often.
_comment_dropVolumeScale: Multiplier that converts drop size into the volume added to the reservoir.
_comment_idleDrainRate: Per-tick rate at which idle fluid reserves are consumed to create drops.
_comment_baseSpawnInterval: Baseline number of ticks between naturally spawning droplets before modifiers.
_comment_waveStiffness: Restoring-force factor governing how quickly fluid surface oscillations rebound to center.
_comment_waveDamping: Damping coefficient that reduces wave amplitude over time to keep motion stable.
_comment_sideFlowRate: Speed at which water equalizes between columns, smoothing lateral height differences.
_comment_rippleFrequency: Frequency of ambient ripple noise injected into the simulation for visual motion.
_comment_rippleAmplitude: Maximum displacement applied by ripple noise to create subtle surface variation.

palette._comment_stops: Gradient colors used to shade the tower's fluid from darkest to lightest.
palette._comment_restAlpha: Opacity for fluid particles when they are idle or resting inside the reservoir.
palette._comment_freefallAlpha: Opacity applied to droplets while they are falling through the air.
palette._comment_backgroundTop: Top color of the background gradient rendered behind the fluid tower.
palette._comment_backgroundBottom: Bottom color of the background gradient that transitions from the top shade.
